name: Arbita
overview: Arbita Inc. provides recruitment marketing technology, media, training and workforce development, and consulting services to connect companies with the candidates on the Internet in the United States and internationally. It offers OneWorld, a solution that includes technology, analytics, career Web site, search engine optimization, and search engine marketing, as well as training and education services to address various aspects of the recruitment challenge; and Arbita Consulting and Education Services, a recruitment tool for strategic recruiter and sourcer development, recruitment marketing process consulting, employment branding, and interactive campaign development. The company also provides OnePost, a job posting solution that empowers companies with a single portal for posting to more job boards in more countries; and OneSource, a sourcing platform that accelerates Internet candidate research by allowing recruiters to extract resumes, candidate profiles, and contact information from search engines. In addition, it offers recruitment marketing analytics to control recruitment advertising and marketing mix; recruitment marketing services; and recruitment advertising and media planning services. The company was formerly known as RecruitUSA and changed its name to Arbita Inc. in 2006. Arbita Inc. was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota.
